source.interface:
<implements name="MatrixDecomposition" />
* A general matrix [A] can be factorized by similarity * transformations into the form [A]=[Q1][D][Q2]-1 where: * *
[A] (m-by-n) is any, real or complex, matrix *
[D] (r-by-r) or (m-by-n) is, upper or lower, bidiagonal *
[Q1] (m-by-r) or (m-by-m) is orthogonal *
[Q2] (n-by-r) or (n-by-n) is orthogonal *
r = min(m,n) * apete
matrix A matrix to decompose true if the computation suceeded; false if not
<method name="getD" type="MatrixStore" startLine="48" endLine="48" /> <method name="getQ1" type="MatrixStore" startLine="50" endLine="50" /> <method name="getQ2" type="MatrixStore" startLine="52" endLine="52" />
